original_title: New York Composers: Searching for a New Music
overview: A look at six young virtuoso composers at the forefront of contemporary music. Featuring: Tan Dun, Michael Gordon, Phil Kline, David Lang, Julia Wolfe, Lois V Vierk, Philip Glass, and Steve Reich. With the participation of the Kronos Quartet, Bang on a Can All Stars, Reigakusha, and others. Filmed in the composersâ€™ studios and at rehearsals and performances.
title: New York Composers: Searching for a New Music
